results.definition: an area in which something acts or operates or has power or control: "the range of a supersonic jet"
examples: a piano has a greater range than the human voice
within the compass of this article
within the scope of an investigation
outside the reach of the law
in the political orbit of a world power

results.definition: the state of the environment in which a situation exists
examples: you can't do that in a university setting

results.definition: a magnifier of images of distant objects
electronic equipment that provides visual images of varying electrical quantities
